name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and superior sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Series 7
description: Advanced smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, GPS, and customizable watch faces. Compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Leather Laptop Bag
description: Genuine leather laptop bag with multiple compartments, padded protection, and adjustable shoulder strap. Professional and stylish.

name: Portable Coffee Maker
description: Compact and portable coffee maker perfect for travel, camping, or office use. Makes perfect espresso anywhere you go.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra thick yoga mat with non-slip surface, eco-friendly materials, and carrying strap. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and meditation.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Luxury designer sunglasses with UV protection, polarized lenses, and elegant frame design. Comes with protective case.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable keys, anti-ghosting technology, and durable construction.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and leak-proof.

name: Wireless Phone Charger
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and overcharge protection.

name: Running Shoes Pro
description: Professional running shoes with advanced cushioning, breathable mesh, and excellent grip. Designed for maximum performance.

name: Ceramic Dinnerware Set

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Vintage canvas backpack with laptop compartment, multiple pockets, and comfortable padded straps. Perfect for school or travel.

name: Air Fryer XL
description: Large capacity air fryer with digital controls, 8 cooking presets, and easy-clean basket. Healthier cooking with less oil.

name: Bluetooth Speaker Waterproof
description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360Â° sound, 12-hour battery life, and built-in microphone. Perfect for outdoor activities.

name: Memory Foam Pillow
description: Contoured memory foam pillow with cooling gel technology. Provides perfect neck support and promotes better sleep.

name: Professional Camera Tripod
description: Sturdy aluminum tripod with fluid head, adjustable height up to 6ft, and quick-release plate. Perfect for photography and videography.

name: Organic Green Tea Set
description: Premium organic green tea collection with 6 different varieties. Rich in antioxidants and naturally sourced.

name: Fitness Resistance Bands

name: Minimalist Wall Clock
description: Scandinavian-style minimalist wall clock with silent movement. Perfect for modern home or office decor.
